riddle: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
David's father has three sons : Snap, Crackle and _____ ?
They have not flesh, nor feathers, nor scales, nor bone. Yet they have fingers and thumbs of their own. What are they?
What has six faces, But does not wear makeup. It also has twenty-one eyes, But cannot see?
This is as light as a feather, yet no man can hold it for long. What am I?
You have three stoves: a gas stove, a wood stove, and a coal stove, but only one match. Which should you light first?
This is as light as a feather, yet no man can hold it for long. What am I?
Tool of thief, toy of queen. Always used to be unseen. Sign of joy, sign of sorrow. Giving all likeness borrowed. What am I?
If you were running a race, and you passed the person in 2nd place, what place would you be in now?
My first is a creature whose breeding is unclear. My second, a price you must pay. My whole can be found in the river of Time and refers to events of today. What am I?
